UL.LI: What is the conjugate variable to volume? Is volume an intensive thermodynamic variable or extensive thermodynamic variable? What about its conjugate variable is it intensive?
Is temperature an extensive or intensive variable? What thermodynamic variable is conjugate to temperature?
Is the number of atoms in a phase an intensive or extensive thermodynamic variable. What thermodynamic variable is conjugate to number of atoms
How do the intensive and extensive thermodynamic variables behave in a system when it is at equilibrium.
